//Declare 2 double variables and display their differences
public class doublevariables {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		// Declare two double variables 
		double doubleVar1 = 3.5;
		double doubleVar2 = 5.7;
		
		//Calculate their difference
		double differenceResult = doubleVar1 - doubleVar2;
		
		//Display the difference
		System.out.println("The difference between " + doubleVar1 +"and " + doubleVar2 +"is: "+differenceResult);
		

	}
}

Output:
The difference between 3.5and 5.7is: -2.2
